comment: I do not care for second if you have an issue with my religious beliefs and no amount of internet bullying can stop what happens next. You are a defective piece of ZioShit.
amr:
# ::snt I do not care for second if you have an issue with my religious beliefs and no amount of internet bullying can stop what happens next. You are a defective piece of ZioShit.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / care-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (s / second)
            :condition (a / and
                  :op1 (ii2 / issue-02
                        :ARG0 (b / believe-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :topic (r / religion))
                        :ARG1 (y / you))
                  :op2 (p / possible-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (s2 / stop-01
                              :ARG0 (a2 / amount
                                    :quant-of (b2 / bully-01
                                          :medium (ii3 / internet)))
                              :ARG1 (e / event
                                    :mod (n / next))))))
      :snt2 (p2 / piece
            :mod (d / defective)
            :part-of (p3 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "ZioShit"))
            :domain (y2 / you)))

comment: The use of derogatory terms are not needed and can be removed
amr:
# ::snt The use of derogatory terms are not needed and can be removed
(a / and
      :op1 (n / need-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (t / term
                        :mod (d / derogatory))))
      :op2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (r / remove-01
                  :ARG1 u)))

comment: Language denigrating women is unacceptable. Please refrain from future use.
amr:
# ::snt Language denigrating women is unacceptable. Please refrain from future use.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a / accept-01
                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :ARG0-of (d / denigrate-01
                              :ARG1 (w / woman)))))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :time (f / future))))
